definition: breach of responsibility/failure to carry out one's duty

sentences.english: With the government's negligent disaster relief, should the entire cabinet resign?
sentences.chinese: 政府救灾失责，您觉得内阁应该总辞下台吗？

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
to fail in observing or supervising/to miss/to let sth slip through
to neglect one's duty/dereliction of duty/malpractice
not to do one's best/not to exert oneself
to cover up (a matter that should be reported to the authorities)
lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to skimp on the job/to work half-heartedly/not to take the job seriously
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
